name: Awaits;10H
description:
Prequel to the upcoming Yume Nikki fangame "Hikensha"(also known as "10Hikensha"), follows the story of a young boy named Yarishi, who is having a hard time with many familiar problems, but that's about to change, as unknown forces lurk around the house and his dreams watching him constantly.

This fangame is purely made as an introduction to the main upcoming game, while it could get some updates in the future, it can be considered a very short, complete game.
